authors.name: Amit Philips
authors.bio: Passionate developer! I've been doing this for 11+ years and I spend my time solving my client's biggest challenges. I am a Cloud Specialist with Bosch and have developed and lead various projects end-to-end. My specialty is building intuitive solutions for Web, Desktop and Mobile using .NET and frontend frameworks.
